subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Giants would like to think that their come-from-behind victory over the Bears in Chicago will come to represent a turning point, when the growing doubts about a teetering team were finally tucked away.
snippet: The Giants would like to think that their come-from-behind victory over the Bears in Chicago will come to represent a turning point, when the growing doubts about a teetering team were finally tucked away.
